024package org.opt4j.satdecoding;
025
026import java.util.List;
027import java.util.Map;
028
029import org.opt4j.core.Genotype;
030
031import com.google.inject.ImplementedBy;
032
033/**
034 * Classes with this interface manage the creation of {@link Genotype}s and the
035 * decoding to a {@link Model}.
036 * 
037 * @author lukasiewycz
038 * 
039 */
040@ImplementedBy(MixedSATManager.class)
041public interface SATManager {
042
043        /**
044         * Returns the {@link Solver}.
045         * 
046         * @return the solver
047         */
048        public Solver getSolver();
049
050        /**
051         * Creates a new {@link Genotype} from the variables, priorities, and
052         * phases.
053         * 
054         * @param variables
055         *            the variables
056         * @param lowerBounds
057         *            the lower bounds for the priority for the variables
058         * @param upperBounds
059         *            the upper bounds for the priority for the variables
060         * @param priorities
061         *            the priorities
062         * @param phases
063         *            the phases
064         * @return the new genotype
065         */
066        public Genotype createSATGenotype(List<Object> variables, Map<Object, Double> lowerBounds,
067                        Map<Object, Double> upperBounds, Map<Object, Double> priorities, Map<Object, Boolean> phases);
068
069        /**
070         * Decodes the {@link Genotype} into a {@link Model}.
071         * 
072         * @param variables
073         *            the variables of the problem
074         * @param genotype
075         *            the genotype
076         * @return the model
077         */
078        public Model decodeSATGenotype(List<Object> variables, Genotype genotype);
079
080}
